name: Sheepmania Forever
description:
Sheepmania Forever is a simple 2D racing game where you control a flying sheep. You can donate if you want to support the further development but this will not give you access to the full game once it is complete so think hard if you think this is worth donating money to. Otherwise just download the demo, have fun with it and give some feedback.

This is just a work-in-progress demo! Not a complete game!

Official website.
